${ModID}:DoubleEspresso.NAME: Double Espresso
${ModID}:DoubleEspresso.FLAVOR: Two shots of espresso in one tin.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces [#924ee4]Espresso [#924ee4]Express. At the start of your first #b3 turns, gain an additional [E] .

${ModID}:EspressoExpress.NAME: Espresso Express
${ModID}:EspressoExpress.FLAVOR: A small can packed with a shot of instant energy.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with an additional [E] .
